In announcing the news of his title change on his Twitter account, Mr. Eric Schmidt simply wrote: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Google is the second tech giant in less than a week to surprise investors with a CEO change. . Critics might question why Joe Biden didn't immediately prepare to deploy as many as 150,000 troops to Afghanistan, Donald Rumsfeld writes.
